summary: A Japanese restaurant cook/owner dies after answering his daughter's cellphone. Other people are getting strange, same ringtone calls as well and dying painfully. It happened in Taiwan as well. Can the police stop it if it's a ghost?
cast: Rie Mimura|Hisashi Yoshizawa|Renji Ishibashi|Haruko Wanibuchi|Peter Ho|Asaka Seto|Chisun|Nana Koizumi|Yûjirô Komura|Shadow Liu|Hakobu Okubo|Karen Ôshima|Tara Platt
title: El pozo
